name: basicdartmouth
description: A Basic Dartmouth Library theme for Omeka-S
author: Dartmouth Library

scripts.postinstall: if test -d node_modules/@dltg/gulp-build; then ln -s node_modules/@dltg/gulp-build/templates/eslintrc.json .eslintrc.json && ln -s node_modules/@dltg/gulp-build/templates/stylelintrc.json .stylelintrc.json; fi
